contentList.content:
Vecna is the much maligned arch-lich who rose to godhood and continues to seek the destruction of the other gods to acquire more power for himself. Owing to his own perspective as a former mortal who had gained knowledge over life and death, it is not uncommon for Vecna to sponspor pacts with warlocks as their undying patron.

Domains: Arcana, Death, Knowledge
Alignment: Neutral Evil

Vecna is the much maligned arch-lich who rose to godhood and continues to seek the destruction of the other gods to acquire more power for himself. Owing to his own perspective as a former mortal who had gained knowledge over life and death, it is not uncommon for Vecna to sponspor pacts with warlocks as their undying patron.

Vecna is the much maligned arch-lich who rose to godhood and continues to seek the destruction of the other gods to acquire more power for himself. His wholly evil paladins work in secret to keep knowledge away from those they deem unworthy to know it and seek out lost and ancient arcana.
